name: VIDEO: Wildfire Mitigation Program Helps Residents Better Protect Homes
description: CAL FIRE/San Diego County Fire and the state are helping homeowners in high fire-risk unincorporated communities with retrofitting using ember-resistant materials and incorporating defensible space to harden homes from wildfires.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Reading Time:  < 1 minuteCAL FIRE/San Diego County Fire and the state are helping homeowners in high fire-risk unincorporated communities with retrofitting using ember-resistant materials and incorporating defensible space to “harden” homes from wildfires. The California Wildfire Mitigation Program is a pilot program with a goal of increasing community resilience in San Diego during a wildfire.
